text: Guess who finally took a walk with you today instead of doom‑scrolling. It felt small but really special.
You made me tea before your meeting and left a sticky note that said “good luck today”. I felt so seen.
You remembered that I hate calls after 9pm and texted instead. It was a tiny thing, but it meant a lot.
You sent me a voice note in the middle of your busy day just to say you were thinking of me.
